label: Chainlink Function Webhook
name: chainLinkFunctionWebhook
description: Start workflow whenever chainlink function webhook is called

inputParameters.label: HTTP Method
inputParameters.name: httpMethod
inputParameters.description: The HTTP method to listen to.

inputParameters.label: Authorization
inputParameters.name: authorization

options.label: API
options.name: headerAuth
options.description: Webhook header must contains "X-API-KEY" with matching key

inputParameters.description: The way to authorize incoming webhook.

inputParameters.label: API key
inputParameters.name: apiKey
inputParameters.description: Incoming call must consists header "x-api-key" with matching API key. You can create new key from the dashboard
